name: DECISE
headerTaglineOne: If you're checking us out, it probably means someone had something wonderful to say about us. ü§©

services.title: Solving the Hardest Problems
services.description: Okay, so we actually call this consulting.  But the truth is, we love solving problems, dreaming big, and seeing the world how it realistically could be--unencumbered by with the way it has always been done.  We're competitive.  We like being challenged. Like legendary American sprinter Michael Johnson once said, ‚ÄúWe're gonna start fast, then we're going to run fast in the middle, then we're gonna end fast.‚Äù

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: Creating and innovating digital platforms for web, mobile web, apps.  You name the platform and we've written code for it.  We built software from scratch or we lift-out existing code--it doesn't matter to us how big of a mess the current code is.  We have won awards for our engineering work and we'd love to show you!

services.title: Data Analytics
services.description: Unlock the power of data to drive more meaningful interactions, more experimentation, testing, and optimization.  If the data exists, we wrangle it, automate it, pack into your data warehouse, and get you the insights to run your business.

services.title: Cyber Security & Compliance
services.description: We red team.  We blue team.  No idea what that those words mean?  We work with our clients to conduct audits, automate controls, and provide advisory services on audit, compliance, and cyber security programs.  Did we mention that we love to be challenged?  Most of our work is in highly regulated and complex environments, some of which require secret clearance. Almost all of our work is at incredibly large scale!

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to execute digital marketing. We champion customer engagement from migrating off legacy platforms, deploying and configuring new systems, and laying the foundation for success.  We help day-to-day to execute customer engagement strategies across the complex ecosystems that make up what is known today as "martech."  Most Marketers aren't IT experts and that's where we come in.

aboutpara: We do things a little differently around here.  We sweat the details.  We work as an extension of your team to provide hands-on execution and delivery of innovative solutions. We help our customers across a wide range of industries get the most of out technology to achieve big outcomes! We pride ourselves in distinguished work ethic and outstanding customer service.  White glove service, blue-collar work ethic.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
